function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on the construction industry","Impact":"Economic downturn and disruption of work routines","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, remote work policies, and contingency planning","Technologies":"Remote work and collaboration tools, health monitoring technologies, and construction management software","People":"Workers, project managers, and construction organization managers","Owner":"Construction companies, government agencies, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Change in working time due to COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased productivity and delays in project completion","Mitigation":"Flexible working schedules, resource reallocation, and efficient project management","Technologies":"Project management software, communication tools, and task tracking systems","People":"Project managers, workers, and construction organization managers","Owner":"Construction companies and project management teams"},{"Description":"Access to software and hardware for job performance during COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced productivity and work efficiency","Mitigation":"Providing necessary software and hardware, training on remote work tools, and IT support","Technologies":"Remote desktop solutions, cloud-based software, and virtual collaboration platforms","People":"Workers and project team members","Owner":"Employers and IT support teams"}]}
